name: Duncan de Groot
bio: Executive Chairman and Technical Lead overseeing EVASA. SANAS Nominated Representative and Technical Signatory, also driving business development. Former Group Executive at Empowerdex for Western Cape, KZN and Pretoria.

name: John de Groot
bio: Chief Executive Officer responsible for finance, administration and HR. Technical Signatory and active in business development.

name: Melanie (Salochini) Pillay
bio: Senior Verification Analyst and Technical Signatory. Manages client files and reviews and signs off files prepared by other analysts.

name: Refilwe Seretloe
bio: Verification Analyst focused on executing verification engagements and compiling defensible evidence for scoring.

name: Kristen-Kay Cloete
bio: B-BBEE Analyst liaising with consultants and clients to ensure a smooth verification. Conducts onsite verifications, validates evidence and calculates scorecards to determine BEE levels.

name: Sesihle Mvumbi
bio: Handles Nil scores, Joint Ventures, Ownership Certificates and Prescribed Fees, ensuring accurate records, compliance and efficient processing.

name: Nadia Toefy
bio: First point of contact for clients. Manages communications between EVASA, clients and staff, ensuring smooth interactions and strong stakeholder relationships.

name: Cathy de Groot
bio: Oversees administration, form development and administrative quality assurance.
